test-set.name: xp-striding-grounded-motionlessD
test-set.description: CP: Striding, RP: Grounded, RS: Motionless Descendant-or-self on childless motionless nodes with different node type selects nothing, so grounded/motionless

test-case.name: xp-striding-grounded-motionlessD001
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: grounded, RS: motionless Base expression: attribute() Separators: / With axes: descendant-or-self With node types: any Invariant: node-type-unequal

modified.change: Added dependency for sweep and posture tests, added @part attribute for subtests
Changed node-type for namespace-node() tests w/o axis specifier from error to namespace, see bug#26788 (only applies to relevant tests)
